a.title: Congratulations Sabish Middle School on Being Named a 2019-20 Title 1 School fo Recognition

div.a: Sabish Middle School Recognized as a Wisconsin Title 1 Beating-the-Odds School

span.div: For a fourth consecutive year, Sabish Middle School has been honored as a Wisconsin Title I School of Recognition.The School of Recognition award is presented to schools leveraging federal Title I funding to provide additional resources and services to economically disadvantaged students.

div.a: Information regarding the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) - INFO SERVICIO DE COMIDA COVID-19

span.div: In the Fond du Lac School District, the health, safety and well-being of our students and staff are our top priorities. With the recently elevated discussion regarding the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the news, we want to take a moment to reinforce preventive safety measures and reference our process and communications. View our webpage with further information.

div.a: Coffee with the Superintendent - Dates Set through May 2020

span.div: Enjoy Coffee and Conversation with Dr. James Sebert, Superintendent of the Fond du Lac School District

ul.li: Hear about progress on the referendum.
Ask any questions you have about the District.

span.div: Parents, staff, community members - all are welcome to attend!

div.a: Fond du Lac School District Online 4K Registration Process

span.p: The Fond du Lac School District will again be offering a half-day, 4 year-old-kindergarten (4K) experience. Children who will be 4 years old on or before September 1, 2020, are eligible to attend.

div.a: Learn more on our Open Enrollment website.

div.span: Revised 2020-2021 School Year Calendar is Available!

This calendar provides a snapshot of inservice, conferences, and holidays during the 2020-21 school year. It was revised 1/24/20 with updates to the Early Childhood (EC) and 4K programs in October 2020 and February 2021.

text-node.a: Calendar for FDL School District 2020-21 - English

span.a: Calendario Del Distrito Escolar De Fond du Lac 2020-2021

div.span: Also as areminder, the most current version of the 2019-20 calendar is the one with the revision date June 10, 2019. The most significant change in that revision is that WE DO have school on Monday, February 17, 2020.

a.span: View our Calendar webpage with the files.

div.a: My Stop App Helps Parents Track Buses

p.span: Fond du Lac School District parents can now use the free My Stop app to determine the location of their child's school bus. The My Stop app displays the school bus's location on a map, as well as provides the estimated time of arrival to a specific student's bus stop. The location of the bus is automatically updated every few seconds to accommodate any delays.

div.span: What's going on for families in the Fond du Lac area?

br.span: Flyers with information about some of the activities for children or families happening in our community are available by going to the Families tab and selectingThings To Do from the drop-down menu.

Enjoy Coffee and Conversation with Dr. James Sebert, Superintendent of the Fond du Lac School District
Hear about progress on the referendum.
Ask any questions you have about the District. Parents, staff, community members - all are welcome to attend!

span.p: The Fond du Lac School District will again be offering a half-day, 4 year-old-kindergarten (4K) experience. Children who will be 4 years old on or before September 1, 2020, are eligible to attend.
